name: Space Frontier (itch)
description:
SPACE FRONTIER

Simple Arcade Space Shooter

Controls:

A,D/Left Arrow,Right Arrow/Dpad Left Right - Move Ship Left And Right

Space/Left Mouse Click/DualShock Cross,Xbox A,Ninetendo B - Shoot

Escape To Pause And Space Bar To Resume Game

How To Play:

Shoot Down The Enemies To Earn Points And Don't Let Them Go Pass You Or Touch Your Ship

simple right ;)

have fun :)
